body_html:
Why is this issue closed?
TF completely lacks any 3D upsampling operations, which is very common unpooling op for 3D (volumentric) images.

E.g. here PyTorch implements nearest neighbor and linear upsampling for 3D images
https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/nn.html#torch.nn.Upsample

Please reopen this issue, and add support for 3D nearest neighbor and linear upsampling.

Please reopen this issue, and add support for 3D nearest neighbor and linear upsampling.
body:
Why is this issue closed?
TF completely lacks any 3D upsampling  operations, which is very common unpooling op for 3D (volumentric) images. 

E.g. here PyTorch implements nearest neighbor and linear upsampling for 3D images
https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/nn.html#torch.nn.Upsample

Please reopen this issue, and add support for 3D nearest neighbor and linear upsampling.
